title: Iconic Fairmont Chateau Lake Louise Alpine Luxury with Mountainside Spa & Acclaimed Dining
description:
Experience the majesty of the Canadian Rockies from this iconic five-star haven on the shores of Lake Louise. This grand chateau-style hotel is a gateway to the awe-inspiring landscapes of Banff National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Step outside and you're on the doorstep of world-class skiing, scenic hiking trails and lake activities.

Indulge in the hotel's high-end amenities, including a state-of-the-art fitness centre and an inviting indoor pool. Savour locally sourced cuisine at one of the six onsite eateries, from fine dining at the Fairview to hearty comfort food at the Lakeview Lounge and unwind with indulgent mountainside treatments at The Spa at Fairmont Chateau Lake Louise.
offer_address: 111 Lake Louise Dr, Lake Louise, Alberta, T0L 1E0, Canada
